issue.title: [CF 106] Ignore runes - not back?
issue.body:
Did you move the ignore runes option when you put it back?

I can't find it.


> Posted by CurseForge user warriorjedi | Imported from CurseForge issue #106 | Raw

comments.body:
Edit: disregard this, seems it was just behaving strangely after i changed it in combat, does not do this now. Cannot find the option to enable though :)

oh, i just cleared the icon and re-created it, and now it shows the item as off cooldown as if the ignore runes option were selected, but I still can't find the actual option.

Intended?//

Edited Jan 27, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user warriorjedi

Wow, I'm dumb.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
